name: Pipi Pepe Takeover Bad Ending (Friday Night Funkin' mod
name_original: Pipi Pepe Takeover Bad Ending (Friday Night Funkin' mod
description: The name of the actual mod is Doki Doki takeover, this is just my reskin. The characters in the mod reskin are based off of me and my brother's childhood hand puppets (Chumelepepe and Chimilipipi). I couldn't figure out how to replace the Intro video and the End video, so they just stayed the same.
